ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date when this resource was created.

ivardefs.name: facility
ivardefs.desc: Facility where the services are intended to be provided.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this coverage eligiblity request.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services.

ivardefs.name: insurer
ivardefs.desc: The Insurer who issued the coverage in question and is the recipient of the request.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: Service categories or billable services for which benefit details and/or an authorization prior to service delivery may be required by the payor.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The party who is the beneficiary of the supplied coverage and for whom eligibility is sought.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: When the requestor expects the processor to complete processing.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the request.

ivardefs.name: purpose_
ivardefs.desc: Code to specify whether requesting: prior authorization requirements for some service categories or billing codes; benefits for coverages specified or discovered; discovery and return of coverages for the patient; and/or validation that the specified cove

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

properties.desc: The CoverageEligibilityRequest provides patient and insurance coverage information to an insurer for them to respond, in the form of an CoverageEligibilityResponse, with information regarding whether the stated coverage is valid and in-force and optionall
